document.full_text: los angeles pitcher chad billingsley weaved his way through the colorado rockies lineup on monday, despite allowing a career-high 11 hits, to lead the dodgers to a 7-1 victory.
document.title: billingsley bends, doesn't break as dodgers top rockies
lines_and_colors: los angeles pitcher chad billingsley weaved his way through the colorado rockies lineup on monday, despite allowing a career-high 11 hits, to lead the dodgers to a 7-1 victory.
